title: Is it wonderful to bath? (TEFC)
brief_description: One of two films based on the work of an eminent Hungarian paediatrician who is concerned with the mental health and well being of children deprived of parents and reared in institutions. Unscripted and filmed in the Loczy Institute the film shows how infants and young children enjoy their bath, if adults have the patience to cooperate with the child encouraging him to be independent. Commentary in English.
